name: AboutBot
description: A Simple About Bot in Telethon~Python

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a new bot through @BotFather and paste Bot Token here.

OWNER_ID.description: Type your permanent telegram ID here.

OWNER_UN.description: Type your username here, including '@'. For eg :- @anonyindian

ABOUT_SECTION.description: Type here what you wanted to keep in about section like your name, username, id, etc.

BOT_SECTION.description: Type here your bot's usernames. You can disable this section by leaving it as it is

OWNERSHIPS.description: List all channels and groups where you are owner.

COM_SECTION.description: List names of all communities where you are member.

FED_SECTION.description: This section is to describe about your fed. You can leave this section as it is to disable it

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal
